name: The 3rd International Academic Conference on Social Sciences
content: The 2016 International Academic Conference on Social Sciences (IACSS 2016) will be held during December 6-8, 2016 in Tokyo, Japan. The IACSS is an interdisciplinary international conference that invites academics and independent scholars, researchers to meet and exchange innovate ideas, research findings and discuss the latest issues concerning Social Sciences fields. For more information, please visit: http://iacss-conf.org/ Email : iacss@iacss-conf.org Sign In Member Center: http://www.iacss-conf.org/guide.asp Organized by Higher Education Forum
